subject: Football (College)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Miami fired Coach Al Golden one day after a 58-0 loss to Clemson, the Hurricanes’ worst defeat in the program’s 90-year history. Larry Scott will be the interim head coach.
snippet: Miami fired Coach Al Golden one day after a 58-0 loss to Clemson, the Hurricanes’ worst defeat in the program’s 90-year history. Larry Scott will be the interim head coach.
